column2: Submits ai_gardening.cpp and ai_reflection.txt. Reflection must include: (1) two things the AI did well, (2) two potential problems with the AI solution, (3) whether the student would trust the solution, with reasoning.

column1: Style: File block comments are provided
Style: Follows remaining relevant style guidelines
column2: Each program can be encapsulated entirely within its respective main() function. This column counts downward from full points with deductions for mistakes (clipped at 0): globals (-5), indentation (up to -10), documentation/variable names (up to -5), naming consistency (up to -5), whitespace separation (up to -3), other style issues (TA discretion, up to -5).

column1: Provides reasonable answers to TA's questions during demo
